docs.text: DISCLAIMER This documentation is nowhere near done. Initial setup You've finally decided that you want Juxta running your server. Splendid. Firstly, you'll have to add the bot . Setup prompt When the bot is in the server, run -setup in any channel to begin using the setup wizard. Here, you will enable, disable, and setup bot features.
docs.title: Home

docs.text: This documentation is nowhere near done.
docs.title: DISCLAIMER

docs.text: You've finally decided that you want Juxta running your server. Splendid. Firstly, you'll have to add the bot .
docs.title: Initial setup

docs.text: When the bot is in the server, run -setup in any channel to begin using the setup wizard. Here, you will enable, disable, and setup bot features.
docs.title: Setup prompt

docs.text: Music Juxta streams high-quality music from YouTube to your server's voice channels. Commands !summon Makes Juxta join your voice channel. Aliases: !join , !connect !leave Makes Juxta leave your voice channel. Aliases: !disconnect !airhorn Plays an airhorn in your voice channel. Your browser doesn't support audio.
docs.title: Music

docs.text: Juxta streams high-quality music from YouTube to your server's voice channels.
docs.title: Music

docs.text: Makes Juxta join your voice channel. Aliases: !join , !connect
